message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that holds significant value. While I can't disclose the exact details right now, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm confident it will be equally valuable, if not more so, for you.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. This is a price that reflects its true potential.  Please consider this offer carefully.  You have a chance to acquire a product that could be incredibly beneficial for your business.
